title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build agentic workflows on AWS with third-party agents and tools (AIM3311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用第三方代理和工具在AWS上构建代理工作流 (AIM3311)
abstract: Discover how to architect and enhance AI development workflows on AWS with powerful third-party agents and tools from AWS Marketplace using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway and Runtime. This session walks through real-world use cases for third-party agents and how to efficiently source and deploy AI development tools the moment you need them. Through architecture diagrams and live demonstrations, we'll explore how to import tools via Gateway, establish connections with your IDE and MCP client, and deploy tools in AgentCore Runtime. Learn architectural best practices and see implementation patterns that showcase the power of integrating third-party products into your AWS workflows.
abstract_cn: 了解如何在AWS上使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway和Runtime，通过AWS Marketplace的强大第三方代理和工具来架构和增强AI开发工作流。本会议将介绍第三方代理的实际用例，以及如何在需要时高效获取和部署AI开发工具。通过架构图和现场演示，我们将探索如何通过Gateway导入工具，建立与IDE和MCP客户端的连接，并在AgentCore Runtime中部署工具。学习架构最佳实践，了解展示将第三方产品集成到AWS工作流中强大功能的实现模式。

presenter.name: Meera Rajaram
presenter.title: Sr. Director Engineering AI, ML & Core Services

presenter.name: Andrei Okhotnikov
presenter.title: Head of Product, AWS Marketplace Deployment
